tweets.text: Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

@chumphris @CanalRiverTrust @Edwina_Currie @robertlargan @EnvAgency @Natures_Voice What complete nonsense. It began overnight, starts from a specific point, and yet no other pollution on this scale is being reported from ANY other marina anywhere in the world üòÇ Come on! ü§î

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Say this again. If the same amount of sewage flowed down each individual highstreets action would be taken, but a river it is deemed acceptable as people don't care, its not their problem. When we loose what we have remember you was warned. This really boils my p**s

tweets.text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Wtf?

Day Nine.
The pollution is STILL emanating from Furness Vale Marina, stretching over a mile to New Mills. The boom at Bridge 29 isn't working and the polluting waste oil is just as bad as it was a week ago. Why is the slick still not being stopped at Bridge 30? @CanalRiverTrust https://t.co/9lxlWtbhQe
@mike88265351 @CanalRiverTrust @Edwina_Currie @robertlargan @EnvAgency @Natures_Voice The boom at 29 was all over the place this morning https://t.co/mReqV9rzGw

@biosolidsbattle @SocEnv_HQ @Waterwise @WaterUK @DwrCymru @EnvAgency @GW4FreshCDT @UK_WIR @FutureWaterAsso Hi, why don't you join our webinar and find out what our UK wastewater sludge scientists have to say üëâ https://t.co/xSrD7jW2AL

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Have I got this right? 
48 hours ago the @EnvAgency say better regulation is needed to protect the environment, and 24 hrs later they say they will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents of and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/0IefMSag90

@biosolidsbattle @SocEnv_HQ @Waterwise @WaterUK @DwrCymru @EnvAgency @GW4FreshCDT @UK_WIR @FutureWaterAsso Hi, why don't you join our webinar and find out what our UK wastewater sludge scientists have to say üëâ https://t.co/xSrD7jW2AL

@FoxesAfloat @CanalRiverTrust @Edwina_Currie @robertlargan @EnvAgency @Natures_Voice I've spoken to the media officer for this CRT region. Environment Agency are happy with CRT response thus far. Initial view is that it's not one single source but from many boats laid up (!!) over winter. I commented on scale of danger 1/

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency How can you have an environment agency that doesn‚Äôt record or report on pollution??
